parameters.name: EventType
parameters.description:
The type of the attack event that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **defense**: attack events that trigger traffic scrubbing
*   **blackhole**: attack events that trigger blackhole filtering

parameters.name: Ip
parameters.description: The IP address of the attacked Anti-DDoS Pro or Anti-DDoS Premium instance.

parameters.name: Range
parameters.description: The number of source IP addresses that you want to return. The source IP addresses are returned in descending order of attack traffic. By default, the top **five** source IP addresses are returned.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The UNIX timestamp when the query starts. Unit: seconds.

> You can call the [DescribeDDosAllEventList](~~188604~~) operation to query the beginning time of all attack events.
